animeTitle: Pi Zhe Lang Pi De Yang
otherNames: A Sheep In Wolf's Clothing, 披着狼皮的羊
synopsis: Web-writer Lai Xiaoguang accidentally entered a virtual world called "The Hand of God." In this fantasy world, she turned into a werewolf named Da Niu and was involved in a national treasure theft case. In order to investigate the truth, she had to embark on a journey with Wang Cai the Goat King.
